# Sample Document

This is a sample document created in Tideflow. Edit this file to get started with your Markdown to PDF workflow.

## Features

- Edit Markdown with real-time PDF preview
- Drag and drop images with automatic sizing
- Control document preferences through simple UI

## Adding images

You can drag images directly into the editor. They will be automatically copied to the assets folder and inserted with the default width and alignment.

## Page breaks

Add a page break like this:

::: {pagebreak}
:::

# New Page

This content will appear on a new page in the PDF.
